The forming of these unions is one of Satan's last efforts. God calls upon His people to get out of the cities, isolating themselves from the world. The time will come when they will have to do this. God will care for those who love Him and keep His commandments.--Letter 26, 1903, pp. 2, 3. (To Brother and Sister J. A. Burden, Dec. 10, 1902.) 

Released September 1964.
